11.ara-name: كتاب النكاح عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:The Prophet said: "A matron should not be given in marriage until she is consulted, and a virgin should not be given in marriage until her permission is sought, and her silence is her permission

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي اسْتِئْمَارِ الْبِكْرِ وَالثَّيِّبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Seeking The Permission Of The Virgin And The Matron
